message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it's a great deal, considering its value.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit too steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $100.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $200 is my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $170 for you. I believe the product's quality and value justify this price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm sticking with my offer of $100.  I really do want this product, but I can't go any higher.
